# Documentation Brief Template

## Audience

- Primary audience (role, experience level)
- Secondary audience

## Goal

- What should the reader be able to do after reading?

## Scope

- Included topics
- Out-of-scope topics

## Prerequisites

- Required knowledge
- Required tools or access

## Document Type

- How-to guide / Reference / Explanation / Onboarding

## Outline

1. Introduction
2. Example
3. Step-by-step instructions
4. Verification
5. Troubleshooting
6. Next steps

## Examples Needed

- Example 1:
- Example 2:

## Review Checklist

- [ ] Clear audience and goal
- [ ] Example first
- [ ] Steps are copy-pasteable
- [ ] Verification included
- [ ] Common issues included
- [ ] Links to related docs
